players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "I have no information to share at the moment, but I urge everyone to keep an open mind and consider all possibilities before making any hasty decisions."

You: "I agree with Bob that we need to be careful and consider the information at hand. However, let's also remember that an innocent person was killed last night, so we should vote based on suspicion and evidence. I personally don't have any concrete evidence yet,..."

Charlie: "I believe it is important that we approach this situation with caution and not jump to conclusions based on suspicion alone. While I cannot deny the seriousness of the situation, I also want to remind everyone that an innocent person was lynched last night. Let's focus..."

You: "I believe that in order to ensure fairness and accuracy in our investigation, we should all share any new information or suspicions that come up during the day. This will help us make a more informed decision when it comes time to vote. Let's work together and..."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso. My investigation confirms it. We must vote him out now to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
